mapper.select: select br.id, br.resource_category_id, br.resource_code, br.resource_url, br.`description`, br.enable_status, br.add_time, br.add_name, br.modify_time, br.modify_name from bms_resource br where br.enable_status = ${@org.starrism.mall.data.pool.BasePool@ENABLE} and exists(select 1 from bms_resource_category brc where brc.enable_status = ${@org.starrism.mall.data.pool.BasePool@ENABLE} and brc.category_code = #{categoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and brc.id = br.resource_category_id )
